long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Swift Security: AI-Powered Protection for Your Browser

Welcome to Swift Security, where we specialize in safeguarding your data and enhancing your organization's security in the age of artificial intelligence. Our cutting-edge browser extension is designed to secure your interactions with AI platforms like ChatGPT, Gemini, and more.

Key Features:
- Visibility into GenAI Usage: Gain deep insights into how generative AI is being used within your organization, with real-time monitoring and logging of sensitive data interactions.

- Real-Time Data Protection: Monitor, log, and control sensitive data, ensuring that your information remains secure.

- Seamless Integration: Fast, easy deployment with centralized visibility and control over AI usage across your organization.

Whether you're protecting sensitive data from public AI models or securing internal AI deployments, Swift Security is your trusted partner in the digital world.
Have questions or feedback?

Contact us at info@swiftsecurity.ai. For more information, visit our website https://www.swiftsecurity.ai/ 

Thank you for choosing Swift Security, your ally in AI-powered protection.
